item.title: SSH Passwordless Authentication
item.author: Author
item.description: SSH login without password? Yeah you heard it right. Today I’m going to teach you how you can enable passwordless authentication in ssh. You can login to your linux servers without password. How? Keep reading… Edit the SSH main configuration file. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 $ sudo vi /etc/ssh/sshd_config ... PubkeyAuthentication yes ... Edit this line. If you see no, change it to yes.
